title: High Tax Revenue from Income and Profits
description: In 2022, taxes on income, profits, and capital gains accounted for 67.86% of Australia's revenue, indicating a strong reliance on these sources for government funding.

title: Significant Mineral Depletion Costs
description: Australia faced a mineral depletion cost of approximately $68.6 billion in 2021, reflecting the economic impact of resource extraction.

title: Top Regulatory Quality
description: In 2023, Australia achieved the highest possible percentile rank in regulatory quality, showcasing its robust regulatory framework.

title: Exceptional Preprimary School Enrollment
description: In 2020, Australia's gross enrollment rate for preprimary education was 160.21%, indicating a strong emphasis on early childhood education.

title: High Preprimary Enrollment for Males
description: In 2020, the gross enrollment rate for preprimary education among males in Australia was 163.34%, highlighting gender inclusivity in early education.

title: High Preprimary Enrollment for Females
description: In 2020, the gross enrollment rate for preprimary education among females in Australia was 156.92%, reflecting strong female participation in early education.

title: Rising Prevalence of Overweight Children
description: In 2024, 26.4% of children under 5 in Australia were estimated to be overweight, indicating a growing public health concern.

title: Low Battle-Related Deaths
description: In 2018, Australia recorded only one battle-related death, underscoring its peaceful domestic environment.
